resources.string: Transbord helps you convert your speech into text anywhere on your device, making communication faster and easier.
Tap the microphone button to start recording. When you\'re done, tap again to stop and transcribe your speech.
Long-press the microphone button to activate the floating button. This allows you to transcribe text directly into any app.
Use our AI tools to enhance your transcriptions. Correct grammar, summarize content, or format your text with a single tap.
